Sentencas: In the present work, cobalt pentlandite (Co9S8) is studied as a solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) anode material which is stable in H2S-containing fuels and is promising in coal-based SOFCs.
Titulo: Hydrothermal impregnation synthesis of cobalt pentlandite as anode material of H2S SOFC

Sentencas: Co9S8 is synthesized via a simple hydrothermal method.
Titulo: Hydrothermal impregnation synthesis of cobalt pentlandite as anode material of H2S SOFC

Sentencas: Uniform and fine Co9S8 particles are deposited on to the YSZ skeleton directly by using hydrothermal impregnation method and adhered to the skeleton closely after heat treating in N-2.
Titulo: Hydrothermal impregnation synthesis of cobalt pentlandite as anode material of H2S SOFC

Sentencas: The symmetrical cells are measured in the presence of 50 ppm H2S-H-2 to determine the electrochemical performance at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Hydrothermal impregnation synthesis of cobalt pentlandite as anode material of H2S SOFC

Sentencas: The polarization resistance is only 0.3385 abroken vertical bar cm(2) at 650 A degrees C.
Titulo: Hydrothermal impregnation synthesis of cobalt pentlandite as anode material of H2S SOFC

Sentencas: It is concluded that Co9S8 exhibits a combination of good electronic conductivity and catalytic activity and has the potential to be used as a sulfur-tolerant anode material of SOFCs.
Titulo: Hydrothermal impregnation synthesis of cobalt pentlandite as anode material of H2S SOFC
